ASLEEP_DESC: Becomes prone and unconscious. Action to wake up. Removed upon taking damage unless noted otherwise.
AUTO_SPELL_CASTINGS: Calcula automaticamente o número máximo de magias baseado no nivel da magia e poder
BASIC_EQUIPMENT_INFO: Mostrar apenas a area de texto, esconder coluna de detalhes de equipamento
BLINDED_DESC: Cannot see: surroundings obscured, sight-based Perception fails. Attack rolls against Defense or Agility get 1 boon. Speed becomes 2 unless lower.
CHARMED_DESC: Trata a fonte como amigo e aliado de confiança. Não é possível atacar a fonte.
COMPELLED_DESC: Não é possível usar ações ou mover. Em vez disso, a fonte pode forçar a criatura a se mover ou usar uma ação durante um tuno rápido. Todas as decisões são tomadas pela fonte.
DEAFENED_DESC: Surdo: Teste de percepção para ouvir falha.
DEFENSELESS_DESC: Defesa se torna 5. Não pode usar ações. Rolagens de desafio falham, exceto para percepção.
DEFENSE_ROLL_BUTTON: Botão de Rolagem de Defesa (requer calculo de defesa)
DICE_BOONS: Dice to use for boons and banes
DISEASED_DESC: All attack rolls and challenge rolls are made with 1 bane.
FATIGUED_DESC: All attack rolls and challenge rolls are made with 1 bane.
FRIGHTENED_DESC: All attack rolls and challenge rolls are made with 1 bane. Cannot take fast turns.
GLOBAL_SPELL_ATTACK_BOONS_BANES: (Boons - Banes) to all spell attack rolls
GLOBAL_WEAPON_ATTACK_BOONS_BANES: (Boons - Banes) to all weapon attack rolls
GRABBED_DESC: Depending on size, either cannot move away (if grabber larger or equal), or move grabbing creature automatically.
IMMOBILIZED_DESC: Speed becomes 0, cannot benefit from bonuses to speed. Attack rolls against get 1 boon.
IMPAIRED_DESC: All attack rolls and challenge rolls are made with 1 bane.
NAME: Name
NPC_INFO: The NPC option sets new characters to default to the NPC card style sheet. Useful if the player characters have already been created and all new character sheets added to the game will likely represent non-player characters.
POISONED_DESC: All attack rolls and challenge rolls are made with 1 bane.
PRONE_DESC: Lies on the ground. Other creatures can move through its space. Strength and Agility rolls are made with 1 bane. Attack rolls against get 1 boon or bane, depending on if they are in reach or not. Can use move to stand up.
SHOW_VERSUS_TEXT: Show a text field instead of dropdown for "Against" fields
SLOWED_DESC: Can only take a slow turn. Speed is halved, cannot benefit from bonuses to speed.
STUNNED_DESC: Cannot use actions or move. Challenge rolls fail. Attack rolls against are made with 1 boon.
SURPRISED_DESC: Cannot use actions or move. Challenge rolls fail.
UNCONSCIOUS_DESC: Cannot use actions or move. Challenge rolls fail. Defense becomes 5.
